trans-unit.source: Exposes <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton" /> types to UI Automation.

trans-unit.source: The element associated with this automation peer.
trans-unit.target: Element skojarzony z tym węzłem równorzędnym automatyzacji.

trans-unit.source: A value enumeration that specifies the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Wyliczenie wartość określająca wzorca formantu.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton" /> that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera wzorzec kontroli <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton" /> skojarzony z <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: An object that supports the control pattern if <paramref name="patternInterface" /> is the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ExpandCollapse" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Scroll" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Transform" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ItemContainer" />, or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SynchronizedInput" /> value; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Obiekt, który obsługuje wzorca formantu, jeśli <paramref name="patternInterface" /> jest <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ExpandCollapse" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Scroll" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Transform" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ItemContainer" />, lub <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SynchronizedInput" /> wartości; w przeciwnym razie <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Hides all items that are in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ukrywa wszystkie elementy, które znajdują się w <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton" /> skojarzonego z tym <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Ten element jest jawną implementacją członków.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Można go używać tylko wtedy, gdy <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer> wystąpienia jest rzutowane na <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider> interfejsu.
